channel.title: Help with Npc's retaliating
channel.description: Hi, I was wanting to know if anyone could help me out with a problem im having. When I attack an npc, it doesn't fight back, unless I click on it twice. Sorry if someone has already posted how to do this, but I searched, and didn't seem to find anything. So, yeah, if you could help, it would be awesome. Thanks. :D

item.title: Help with Npc's retaliating
item.dc:creator: @Patrick_M_25 Patrick M 25
item.description:
@Patrick_M_25 wrote:

Hi, I was wanting to know if anyone could help me out with a problem im having. When I attack an npc, it doesn’t fight back, unless I click on it twice. Sorry if someone has already posted how to do this, but I searched, and didn’t seem to find anything. So, yeah, if you could help, it would be awesome. Thanks.

Read full topic
